itemLabel: Tony Newton, Baron Newton of Braintree

wikipedia_page.main: Antony Harold Newton, Baron Newton of Braintree, OBE, PC, DL (29 August 1937 – 25 March 2012) was a British Conservative politician and former Cabinet member.  He was the member of Parliament for Braintree from 1974 to 1997, and was later a member of the House of Lords.

response: * Tony Newton, Baron Newton of Braintree OBE, PC, DL (1937–2012) Conservative politicianBBC News, 26 March 2012 retrieved January 2018 and former Cabinet member
